key.name: close_new_message_window_confirmation
key.value: Do you want to close the new message box?

key.name: confirm_delete_im
key.value: Are you sure you want to remove Messages?

key.name: delete_chat_desc
key.value: Before uninstalling Messages plugin we have to remove all existing users' chat content. This may take awhile.

key.name: delete_confirm_message
key.value: Are you sure you want to delete selected conversation(s)?

key.name: email_notifications_new_message
key.value: Someone sends me a new message

key.name: feedback_send_message_interval_exceed
key.value: Mass-messaging is blocked. You need to wait for {$send_message_interval} seconds before sending a message again.

key.name: mark_conversation_read_message
key.value: Conversation has been marked as read

key.name: mark_conversation_unread_message
key.value: Conversation has been marked as unread

key.name: mark_read_fail_message
key.value: Failed to mark conversation as read

key.name: mark_unread_fail_message
key.value: Failed to mark conversation as unread

key.name: messages_email_notifications_new_chat_message
key.value: Someone sends me a new chat message

key.name: messages_email_notifications_new_message
key.value: Someone sends me a new mail message

key.name: message_too_long_error
key.value: Ouch, that's a long text! Try to be a little more compact, under {$maxLength} symbols.

key.name: notification_mail_template_html
key.value:
Hello {$username},

You have received a new message from {$sendername} on {$site_name}.

Go to {$replyUrl} to reply to this message.

Sincerely, {$site_name} administration

key.name: notification_mail_template_text
key.value:
Hello {$username},
You have received a new message from {$sendername} on {$site_name}.
Go to {$replyUrl} to reply to this message.
Sincerely, {$site_name} administration

key.name: please_enter_captcha
key.value: Before you continue sending messages let's make sure you are a human. Please confirm the security code below:

key.name: please_enter_valid_value
key.value: Value is incorrect or greater than server limit.

key.name: plugin_configuration_notice
key.value:
The Messages plugin is being installed. Time for completing the installation depends on the number of users and cron schedule.
Installed so far: {$percents}%

key.name: plugin_installation_notice
key.value:
The Messages plugin is being installed. Time for completing the installation depends on the number of users and cron schedule.
Installed so far: {$percents}%

key.name: privacy_action_invite_to_chat
key.value: Who can invite me to chat

key.name: read_chat_message_permission_denied
key.value: You do not have enough permissions to read this message.

key.name: read_message_permission_denied
key.value: You do not have enough permissions to read messages.

key.name: read_permission_denied
key.value: You do not have enough permissions to read this message.

key.name: reply_to_chat_message_permission_denied
key.value: You do not have enough permissions to reply.

key.name: reply_to_message_permission_denied
key.value: You do not have enough permissions to reply to messages.

key.name: send_chat_message_permission_denied
key.value: You do not have enough permissions to write messages.

key.name: send_message_permission_denied
key.value: You do not have enough permissions to write messages.

key.name: settings_desc_show_all_members
key.value: Really bad idea for big sites

key.name: settings_label_send_message_interval
key.value: Allow to send messages once in

key.name: settings_label_show_all_members
key.value: Show all members in chat userlist

key.name: uninstall_inprogress_desc
key.value:
The Messages plugin is being uninstalled. Time for completing the uninstallation depends on the number of users and cron schedule.
Uninstalled so far: {$percents}%

key.name: upload_file_cant_write_file_error
key.value: Failed to write file to disk.

key.name: upload_file_extension_is_not_allowed
key.value: The file extention is not allowed.

key.name: upload_file_file_partially_uploaded_error
key.value: The uploaded file was only partially uploaded.

key.name: upload_file_invalid_extention_error
key.value: A PHP extension stopped the file upload. PHP does not provide a way to ascertain which extension caused the file upload to stop.

key.name: upload_file_max_upload_filesize_error
key.value: The uploaded file exceeds the max upload filesize.

key.value: User you are trying to contact is deleted.

key.value: User you are trying to contact is not approved.

key.value: '{$username}' is not authorized to use chat

key.name: user_is_not_authorized_read_messages
key.value: User is not authorized to read messages

key.name: user_is_not_verified
key.value: User you are trying to contact is not verified.

key.name: user_is_suspended
key.value: User you are trying to contact is suspended.

key.name: user_is_unreachable
key.value: User you are trying to contact is suspended.

key.name: use_chat_permission_denied
key.value: You do not have enough permissions to use chat.

key.value: {$displayname} only accepts chat requests from friends

key.name: write_here
key.value: You can write your reply here...
